name: Parks-mcclellan-simple
tagline: Simple Parks-McClellan equiripple filter design based around the "firpm" function in MATLAB
body:
### Parks McClellan Design
This program illustrates the design procedure of a simple FIR equiripple design. Specify the frequencies you want to limit, specify the tolerance, and the script will run and plot the results of your design. Example:

![](http://postimg.org/image/3x31jni6z/)

### Files Description
I am still working on making them more organized and easier to understand, as well as improving some of the features.
